title: [feature request] Different interpolation algos for 'grid_sample' function
body_html: The 2D grid interpolator function 'grid_sample' only does bilinear sampling from the source image at the moment. It would be useful to have 'nearest' and other samplings available. The function call does take 'mode' as a parameter but only bilinear sampling seems to have been implemented. It would especially be useful if we have to use 'grid_sample' for class label maps for segmentation, and the grid (source indices) is a Variable.
